impact-statement: A mathematical model built around the assumption that the desire to maintain internal homeostasis drives the behavior of animals, by affecting their learning processes, can explain many real-world behaviors, including some that might otherwise appear irrational.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
